# streamkap_transform (Data Source)

Retrieves information about a **Streamkap transform** by ID.

Use this data source to look up transform details including topic mappings.

[Documentation](https://docs.streamkap.com/streamkap-provider-for-terraform)

## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    streamkap = {
      source  = "streamkap-com/streamkap"
      version = ">= 2.0.0"
    }
  }
  required_version = ">= 1.0.0"
}

provider "streamkap" {}

data "streamkap_transform" "example-transform" {
  id = "660ab64aeb8783e6b76abee3"
}

output "example-transform" {
  value = data.streamkap_transform.example-transform
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) The unique identifier of the transform to retrieve.

### Read-Only

- `name` (String) Display name of the transform.
- `start_time` (String) The start time of the transform.
- `topic_ids` (List of String) List of topic identifiers associated with this transform.
- `topic_map` (Attributes List) List of topic mappings showing input and output topics for this transform. (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--topic_map))

<a id="nestedatt--topic_map"></a>
### Nested Schema for `topic_map`

Read-Only:

- `id` (String) Topic mapping identifier.
- `name` (String) Topic name in the mapping.
